title: May's Big Hug Day
backCoverBlurb: May loves to share hugs with everyone he loves! Join him in this cozy story about cuddles and the warm feeling of a big squeeze.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He has an expressive face and is wearing a blue and white striped shirt.

pages.text: May woke up with a big smile. He wanted a hug! Can you show a big hug?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting in his high chair, stretching his arms out wide with a joyful expression.

pages.text: He saw his brown teddy bear. Squeeze! May gave it a warm hug.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is hugging a fluffy brown teddy bear very close to his chest, looking content.

pages.text: The teddy was soft and bumpy. It felt so cozy in May's arms.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. Close up of May's happy face as he cuddles with his soft teddy bear.

pages.text: Then May saw his mommy. Hug! he cried. Pop! He jumped up.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is reaching his arms up towards his mommy, looking surprised and excited.

pages.text: Mommy gave May a sweet, gentle squeeze. It felt like a warm blanket.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is being hugged by his mommy, both of them sharing a loving and happy moment.

pages.text: They sat on the fluffy rug. Everything felt calm and safe with Mommy.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting quietly with his mommy on a soft, colorful rug in a bright room.

pages.text: May gave his soft kitty a gentle hug. Purr! said the happy kitty.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is gently patting a small, soft grey cat that is sitting on the floor.

pages.text: Now it was time for a nap. May hugged his smooth white pillow.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is lying down on a soft bed, hugging his pillow with a sleepy expression.

pages.text: Hugs are for everyone! thought little May. Do you want a hug too?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking at the camera with his mouth open in an 'O' shape, looking surprised and happy.

pages.text: Sharing hugs made May's heart feel very, very full of love.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May has his hands on his heart and is smiling with his bright blue eyes.

pages.text: One last big squeeze for his teddy before he closed his eyes.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is tucked in bed, hugging his teddy bear one last time in the soft light.

pages.text: Sweet dreams, May. Hugs for you all night long. Sleep tight!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. A close-up of May sleeping peacefully, looking very calm and empowered.
